amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to decrease the Bureau of Land Management's Wild Horse and Burro program funds by $74.232 million to Fiscal Year 2019 levels.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Griffith amendment (A002) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Griffith amendment (A002) Failed by voice vote.
